post.body: http://snipr.com/com-trusted-2008 ;)
ooh, that's tough: is bust an innovation? perhaps: creative destruction? 1st web-savvy Pres? GOOG loses don't be evil debate?
Hi Michael, do I need to worry and/or do anything special for updating wordpress (wrt IntenseDebate)? plan 2 do it sometime soon :)
I think maybe that has more to do with Adobe opening up the format than anything else (?)
yes, it may work for runtogetherdomainnameslikethis - but few people grasp single word top keyword domain names r different
I have received offers via the certified service, but they have been too low (not ridiculous, but not realistic, either)
re http://fooddemoccracynow.org you are c'ing too much -- so remove a c! ;D
shopping went social many years ago - shopping.com was 1 of my top examples of the Wisdom of the Language long b4 ebay bought it
ah, LOL -- at the end of the call-in suggested you might "explain" your twitter username (or something like that ;) Merry Xmas :D
ah, yes - I see: all javascript? would be cool if short links could be "expanded" (I understand directly clickable may be prob)
you mean I had to sign in to youtube for THAT?!? LOL -- Americans! ROFL ;D
enjoyed the call-in show (waiting for jangles explanation ;) see also http://snipr.com/linktwitterpwnsearch @stevebaker @jbernoff
I submitted a response to your "social media star" blog post -- and then resubmitted it with minor typo correction (apostrophes)
would you please tell me more about your grievance? :)
can I use the "-" operator (or similar) retweet search? (for example: I want to do a boolean search including "-alltop.com" ;)
oh -- I guess I should have used twitter as one of my examples in my reply (maybe next time ;)
gave her some feedback (while you were giving me feedback ;) -- btw: why isn't she on twitter?!? ;D
LinkedIn.COM is only a brand name; I have far better keyword sites for business networking (not only for USA, also globally ;)
you guys SO *GET* the Wisdom of the Language! :D http://snipr.com/wisdom-link will definitely add/make room for a couple of these
your tweets are very touching (you seem to be very open-hearted and cherish a wonderfully loving relationship with your father :)
Hi Paul -- checked out your website / blog ... -- Q: what's the best way to contact you?
I think I am DONE with twitter -- SixApart's MT totally ROCKS: http://movabledemo.com/motion_demo I predict it will spread like WILDFIRE! ;D
Secret Q of the day: fed http://snipr.com/link-twitter-search
OK, this one is for the lulz: http://snipr.com/link-media-lulz ;D
Twitter RT itself when under press releases http://tinyurl.com/62po7v nice cover what u can do w simple drumkit: I like it!
RT myself one way to explain twitter is to note the versatility of the kazoo as a musical instrument: http://tinyurl.com/5s29vk sorry lo-fi
RT @smallbiztrends Are u a small business owner? Weigh in with what u want from vendors + get a link to your site http://tinyurl.com/6nbz23
one way to explain twitter is to note the versatility of the kazoo as a musical instrument: http://tinyurl.com/5s29vk
RT @jeffreymcmanus http://sockandawe.com via @HelenWalters my high score so far is 4 -- giving up while I'm ahe-... not behind after 3 tries
RT @stevebaker computers in schools via @shirleybrady see also http://snipr.com/link-confused-result + http://snipr.com/debates-social-cause
RT @shirleybrady @dekrem apparently I am in good (i.e. "usable" ;) company with my gut feelings
I have to say that all predications @ http://tinyurl.com/5nd9wd were uninspiring. :| Computer? "Working!..." see http://gaggle.info/news ;D
ah, so the trending meme is not "Bush Shoe(s)" but rather Iraqi? Is that more politically correct?!?
Watchting Inconvenient Truth for 1st time; 1st pic of Earth published 40 yrs ago today; ( see also http://snipr.com/link-informationecon :)
What do people mean when they say we live in an information economy? No such thing as a free price http://snipr.com/link-informationecon
"Can Technorati Beat Google at Blog Search?" is OK Better Question: What Does Twitter Mean? Trouble ;) http://snipr.com/linktwitterpwnsearch
I like @danzarrella's retweet search tool a lot (so I've included it on http://twitter.social-networks.info -- even though I *hate* flash ;)
Text of Letter from Meredith A. Baker to Peter Dengate-Thrush (Chairman of Board of Directors, ICANN) http://snipr.com/icann-meredith-baker
just registered at ars technica -- was happy to see how Joel agree w/ what I said over half a year ago http://snipr.com/ars-tld-domain-names
Stupidity of crowds: they cannot see the MOB for the Madoffs http://snipr.com/digg-bubbleblindness
